text: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|112|25$تَبْخَسُواْ|deprive|91|104|6587$ٱلنَّاسَ|people|75|88|446$أَشْيَآءَهُمْ|(of) their things,|130|143|6588$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|117|25$تَعْثَوْاْ|commit evil|94|107|580$فِى|in|48|54|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth,|92|298|100$مُفْسِدِينَ|spreading corruption.|160|366|581$

name: Word By Word
text: وَٱتَّقُواْ|And fear|78|94|467$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|139|138$خَلَقَكُمْ|created you|100|132|191$وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ|and the generations|153|185|13047$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|the former."|99|115|5507$

name: Word By Word
text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ|But they denied him,|157|167|6500$فَأَخَذَهُمْ|so seized them|119|140|13050$عَذَابُ|(the) punishment|134|154|5574$يَوْمِ|(of the) day|101|122|10$ٱلظُّلَّةِ‌ۚ|(of) the shadow.|132|142|13051$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, it|84|112|396$كَانَ|was|57|114|913$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|191|1786$يَوْمٍ|(of) a Day|88|145|2331$عَظِيمٍ|Great.|75|103|3522$

name: Word By Word
text: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|112|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|110|586$لَهُوَ|surely, He|86|114|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|174|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|154|398$

name: Word By Word
text: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|138|1195$لَتَنزِيلُ|surely, is a Revelation|165|218|13052$رَبِّ|(of the) Lord|105|158|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.|124|150|8$

name: Word By Word
text: نَزَلَ بِهِ|Has brought it down,|159|229|13053$ٱلرُّوحُ|the Spirit|82|222|10520$ٱلْأَمِينُ|[the] Trustworthy,|145|215|13054$

name: Word By Word
text: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|135|1195$لَفِى|surely, (is) in|107|152|1513$زُبُرِ|(the) Scriptures|126|171|13058$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people).|184|207|5507$

name: Word By Word
text: فَقَرَأَهُۥ|And he (had) recited it|172|183|13064$عَلَيْهِم|to them,|77|100|22$مَّا|not|42|65|262$كَانُواْ|they would|93|116|94$بِهِۦ|in it|52|75|204$مُؤْمِنِينَ|(be) believers.|116|127|879$

name: Word By Word
text: كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|96|702$سَلَكْنَـٰهُ|We have inserted it|150|188|13065$فِى|into|48|86|89$قُلُوبِ|(the) hearts|101|139|3365$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|(of) the criminals.|138|157|5641$

name: Word By Word
text: لَا|Not|43|49|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|they will believe|126|138|35$بِهِۦ|in it|52|64|204$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|76|526$يَرَوُاْ|they see|78|90|8289$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment|122|134|1442$ٱلْأَلِيمَ|[the] painful.|107|113|8290$

name: Word By Word
text: فَيَأْتِيَهُم|And it will come to them|181|198|13066$بَغْتَةً|suddenly,|83|116|5526$وَهُمْ|while they|88|121|256$لَا|(do) not|75|108|30$يَشْعُرُونَ|perceive.|105|122|88$

name: Word By Word
text: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا|So is it for Our punishment|197|351|13069$يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ|they wish to hasten?|160|314|13070$

name: Word By Word
text: أَفَرَءَيْتَ|Then have you seen|155|194|11287$إِن|if|44|122|225$مَّتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ|We let them enjoy|142|220|13071$سِنِينَ|(for) years|91|130|9020$

name: Word By Word
text: وَمَا|And not|72|152|46$تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ|have brought it down|162|322|13074$ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينُ|the devils.|110|190|947$

name: Word By Word
text: وَمَا|And not|72|101|46$يَنۢبَغِى|(it) suits|77|135|11319$لَهُمْ|[for] them|88|146|98$وَمَا|and not|71|129|46$يَسْتَطِيعُونَ|they are able.|124|153|2457$

name: Word By Word
text: يُلْقُونَ|They pass on|109|143|2857$ٱلسَّمْعَ|(what is) heard,|127|194|8133$وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ|and most of them|137|204|5290$كَـٰذِبُونَ|(are) liars.|90|124|13086$

name: Word By Word
text: إِلَّا|Except|65|74|86$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|107|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|100|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|110|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|righteous deeds|125|143|239$وَذَكَرُواْ|and remember|113|131|13092$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|62|184$كَثِيرًا|much,|72|106|275$وَٱنتَصَرُواْ|and defend themselves|173|242|13093$مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا|after|120|189|13094$ظُلِمُواْ‌ۗ|they were wronged.|153|188|9966$وَسَيَعْلَمُ|And will come to know|168|192|9507$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|137|20$ظَلَمُوٓاْ|have wronged|113|161|558$أَىَّ|(to) what|84|132|13095$مُنقَلَبٍ|return|79|103|13096$يَنقَلِبُونَ|they will return.|125|125|13097$
